whoIAm.subtitle: Who I Am
whoIAm.content: Hi! I'm Berna Kocalar, a passionate Full Stack Developer who loves building user-friendly and visually appealing web applications. I enjoy turning complex problems into simple, beautiful, and intuitive designs.

academicBackground.subtitle: Education
academicBackground.content: I hold a Bachelor's Degree from Hacettepe University. Additionally, I completed a 6-month intensive Full Stack Development Bootcamp at Workintech, where I mastered modern web technologies.

experience.title: Experience
experience.content: With over a year of hands-on experience in full-stack development, I have built various projects ranging from social platforms to personal tools, focusing on clean code and performance.

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: Technical Expertise
skills.content: I specialize in the JavaScript ecosystem, including React, Redux, Node.js, and Express. I am also proficient in Java, Spring Boot, SQL (PostgreSQL), and styling tools like TailwindCSS.

hobbies.title: Hobbies
hobbies.subtitle: Beyond Coding
hobbies.content: When I'm not coding, you can find me lost in the world of movies and TV series. I'm a total fangirl who loves diving into good stories! I also enjoy reading books and exploring new cultures.

services.readixon: A Wattpad-like platform for writers to create, publish, and share their stories with a community.
services.athlor: A platform for sharing sports events, featuring live streaming, chat, and social posts.
services.nestforyou: An IMDb-like personal movie tracker with private reviews and detailed insights.
services.weatherapp: A real-time weather application providing forecasts and current conditions.
services.taskmanager: A productivity tool for managing daily tasks and collaborating with teams.
